name: The Suicide of MrTanaka
description:
This adventure (sort of) game was made for Scream Lite Game Jam by this one and only person. The theme was Profit and Corporations, so I decided to do somethin over the suicides of salariman, wiith a touch from the Tabletop RPG Kult:Divinity Lost. I tried to create some sort of lovecraftian vibe for it, so do not expect jumpscares. Also, it has two small puzzles.

Is it ready? Far from it. It's playable, but I didn't have the time to finish musics and other feel good stuff.

Is it good? Maybe. You tell me. I hope you enjoy.
